Submitted at2018-01-03
Gas used894183
pragma solidity 0.4.24;

contract Sort {
    function sort(uint[] input) public pure returns(uint[]) {
        if (input.length == 0) {
            return input;
        }
        if (input.length < 50) {
            revert();
        }
        quickSort(input, uint(0), uint(input.length - 1));
        return input;
    }

    function quickSort(uint[] memory arr, uint left, uint right) internal pure {
        uint i = left;
        uint j = right;
        
        uint pivot = arr[left + (right - left) / 2];
        while (i <= j) {
            while (arr[i] < pivot) { 
                i++;
            }
            while (pivot < arr[j]) { 
                j--;
            }
            if (i < j) {
                (arr[i], arr[j]) = (arr[j], arr[i]);
                i++;
                j--;
            } else if (i == j) {
                i++;
                j--;
            }
        }
        if (left < j) {
            if (j - left == 2) {
                if (arr[left] > arr[left+1]) {
                    if (arr[left] > arr[j]) {
                        (arr[left], arr[j]) = (arr[j], arr[left]);
                        if (arr[left] > arr[left+1]) {
                            (arr[left], arr[left+1]) = (arr[left+1], arr[left]);
                        }
                    } else {
                        (arr[left], arr[left+1]) = (arr[left+1], arr[left]);
                    }
                } else {
                    if (arr[left+1] > arr[j]) {
                        (arr[left+1], arr[j]) = (arr[j], arr[left+1]);
                        if (arr[left] > arr[left+1]) {
                            (arr[left], arr[left+1]) = (arr[left+1], arr[left]);
                        }
                    }
                }
            } else if (j - left == 1) {
                if (arr[left] > arr[j]) {
                    (arr[left], arr[j]) = (arr[j], arr[left]);
                }
            } else {
                quickSort(arr, left, j);
            }
        } 
        if (i < right) {
            if (right - i == 2) {
                if (arr[i] > arr[i+1]) {
                    if (arr[i] > arr[right]) {
                        (arr[i], arr[right]) = (arr[right], arr[i]);
                        if (arr[i] > arr[i+1]) {
                            (arr[i], arr[i+1]) = (arr[i+1], arr[i]);
                        }
                    } else {
                        (arr[i], arr[i+1]) = (arr[i+1], arr[i]);
                    }
                } else {
                    if (arr[i+1] > arr[right]) {
                        (arr[i+1], arr[right]) = (arr[right], arr[i+1]);
                        if (arr[i] > arr[i+1]) {
                            (arr[i], arr[i+1]) = (arr[i+1], arr[i]);
                        }
                    }
                }
            } else if (right - i == 1) {
                if (arr[i] > arr[right]) {
                    (arr[i], arr[right]) = (arr[right], arr[i]);
                }
            } else {
                quickSort(arr, i, right);
            }
        }   
    }
}
